name: Cold Embrace
desc: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

name: Feast
desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

name: Dream Coil
desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Cursed Crown
desc: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

name: Call Down
desc: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Heartstopper Aura
desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

name: Voodoo Restoration
desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

name: Double Edge
desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

name: Bloodlust
desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

name: Battle Trance
desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
